items.title: Apple Watch Ultra 3 just hit its best price ever at $120 off (Undercutting official Black Friday deal)
items.summary:
Update 11/30: Amazon is starting to price match at $679, as we expected. It appears Best Buy’s offers have now jumped back to $699 – Amazon’s listings are the only options for the $679 deal as of right now.

The brand new Apple Watch Ultra 3 finally got the $99 price drop we had projected for Black Friday this year, but it has now dropped even lower. We are currently waiting on an Amazon price match, which will almost surely happen at any time now, but Best Buy Amazon is now offering the best price ever down at $679 shipped – that’s $120 off and this is the first time we have seen all band options in all sizes marked down at the same time as well).

items.title: Amazon Cyber Monday deals up to 52% off Samsung monitors now live: Odyssey gaming and Smart Monitors from just $80
items.summary:
Update 11/30: Samsung is offering fresh Cyber Monday offers directly at its online store as well now with savings of up to $1,000. More details in the original post below.

As part of its now live Cyber Monday sale event, Amazon is offering huge discounts on almost all Samsung monitors, including Odyssey gaming and Smart Monitor models. Many of these are either fresh lows or are back to their lowest prices, and you can save up to 52% by cashing in on these Black Friday prices. The sale even includes some of the newest displays, like this 27-inch Odyssey G60SF 500Hz OLED unit, and the prices for these monitors, believe it or not, are starting at just $80. Head below for a closer look at the deals.

As part of the ongoing Cyber Monday sale, the official Anker storefront at Amazon is offering some solid discounts right now with notable price drops across its lineup of 2025 Prime charging stations, Nano power banks, MagSafe 25W Qi2 charging stands, and more. On top of the offers that went live last week, Anker has now added several new deals to the lineup, dropping its Qi2 2-in-1 charging stand and 240W 8-in-1 Prime charging station to their lowest prices yet. All these charging units are now up to 56% off for Black Friday. While many of these are matched directly at the Anker’s online store alongside other member perks and blind boxes, the Amazon storefront is offering deeper discounts on select items, as highlighted below.

items.title: Apple deals still live for Black Friday Weekend – AirPods 4 $69, M5 MacBook Pro $250 off, Apple Series 11/Ultra 3, iPads, more
items.summary:
Black Friday might have come and gone now, officially speaking, but the deals certainly haven’t. While there are a few notable discounts that have jumped back up price, by and large the best of the Apple deals are still live for Black Friday Weekend. Amazon did officially kick off its Cyber Monday event this morning and its carrying over some of the most notable deals we tracked yesterday, not the least of which is AirPods 4 down at an insane $69 shipped as well as the best price to date on the best earbuds you can buy, AirPods Pro 3. Those offers join ongoing all-time lows on the brand new M5 MacBook Pro at $250 off, M4 MacBook Air with at least $250 in savings, loads of iPad deals, and one of the best values in Black Friday Mac deals, the venerable M4 Mac mini from just $479. Of course, Apple Watch Series 11, Apple Watch Ultra 3, and the more affordable SE models are also joining the extended Black Friday party as well – scope everything out below

items.title: Anker’s epic 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand with display still down at $150 all-time low for Black Friday
items.summary:
As part of its now live Black Friday Week sale event, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its latest 25W Qi2 3-in-1 MagSafe charging stand for $149.49 shipped. This is one of the newer models Anker debuted a couple of months back for $230, and it’s now seeing its steepest price drop yet. Today’s 35% discount takes $80 off its usual going rate, landing it $20 below its previous all-time low and our mention from last month. Both Phantom Gray and White variants have hit the $150 low today, and Anker’s online store is matching the price for them today at $150. It’s one of our favorite 25W Qi2 charging stations at the moment, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

items.title: Amazon’s official Levi’s Black Friday/Cyber Monday Sale live now, up to 60% off jeans, jackets, more
items.summary:
Amazon launched its full Levi’s Black Friday event, and the deals are even deeper than the early Black Friday sale. You can score up to 60% off Levi’s jeans, jackets, and wardrobe essentials, including classic fits, tapered cuts, iconic trucker jackets, and more.

items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation Black Friday Edition – RTX 50-series laptops up to $950 off, Copilot+ PCs, accessories, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. It’s been a packed few days as we wrapped up Black Friday Week, tracking major deals on gaming laptops, desktops, accessories, Windows Copilot+ PCs, and more. Many of these offers are still live through the weekend if you missed anything during the rush. From Best Buy’s doorbusters to discounts on Logitech gear, gaming monitors, SSDs, and beyond, there are loads of deals ready and waiting for you in this week’s Battlestation Weekly.

more…

items.title: Belkin’s new 25W Qi2.2 MagSafe charging stands hit Black Friday all-time lows at 25% off
items.summary:
While Amazon has technically flipped over to its official 2025 Cyber Monday sale now, the Black Friday weekend deals are still flying and we have a new all-time low on Belkin’s brand new UltraCharge Pro 3-in-1 Magnetic Charging Dock. One of the latest and more premium Qi2.2 25W models on the market, it is now seeing one of its first decent price drops since release a couple months ago alongside the 3-in-1 Foldable UltraCharge.

more…

items.title: 9to5Toys Electrified Black Friday Edition – Heybike Mars 3.0 and Ranger 3.0 Pro e-bikes back at lows from $1,199, Segway, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. If the title wasn’t enough of a hint and you haven’t been aware of the lead-ups to this week, this edition is centered around all the new Black Friday deals from over the week, with EVs leading the charge with unexpected price drops. The biggest of them is Heybike’s new Mars 3.0 Folding Fat-tire e-bike dropping to its $1,199 low, while Heybike’s new Ranger 3.0 Pro Folding e-bike drops to its $1,399 low. Plus, there’s Segway’s latest E3 Pro Electric Scooter that fell to a new $500 low for this holiday event. You’ll find those and more waiting for you below, with all the best ongoing deals from over the last few weeks rounded up into our one-stop shopping Black Friday Green Deals hub here.

more…

items.summary:
Best Buy rolled out some fresh deals yesterday for main 2025 Black Friday event, and tonight is the final call for those doorbuster offers. You’ve only got a few hours left to snag these deep, limited-time discounts before they disappear. The broader Black Friday sale continues, but the doorbusters – including best-ever pricing on an M5 MacBook Pro config, fresh gaming gear drops, Smart TV steals, and more – wrap up today. All updated deals are now live, along with the usual Deals of the Day, so here’s a closer look at what’s new before the doorbusters are gone.

more…

items.title: 9to5Toys Steals Weekly Black Friday Edition – 3-in-1 charging cube, Spigen carabiners, Belkin Qi2 MagSafe stand, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Steals Weekly – your go-to spot for already-affordable everyday essentials that are now selling for even less. This weekly roundup pulls together all of the Steals from the past week, and puts them in a digestable list for you to consume every Saturday morning. Black Friday may be in the rearview mirror, but now we’re barreling towards Cyber Monday. This is always a strange time when products jump up in price over the weekend, some remain discounted, and others go up and don’t come back for a while. It’s a bit hit or miss. At any rate, our most popular Steals throughout Black Friday Week included from this 3-in-1 charging cube at just $29, a 3-pack of Spigen’s zinc alloy carabiner clips down at $4.50 each, and Belkin’s foldable Qi2 MagSafe charging stand for $25. As usual, you can find these and all the rest down below.

items.title: Best Black Friday Mac deals are still live – if you’re buying one this year, do it now
items.summary:
Amazon’s official main event sale is now live, and the Black Friday Mac deals are not playing around this year. Not only are we seeing some of the best prices ever on Apple’s most affordable current-gen machine – you can literally bring a brand new Mac home right now at under $480 (that’s wild), but its most sought-after and accessible MacBook Air is now at the best prices ever with as much as $300 in savings. On top of that, the M5 MacBook Pro, with not much more than a month under the sun now, is already $250 off. Black Friday is Black Fridaying folks, if you have a Mac in your near future, now’s the time to grab one. Scope out the best Black Friday Mac deals below.
